title: "Hands-on Exercise 8"
author: "Leng Yi Xiu"
date: "Oct 20 2024"
date-modified: "last-modified"

  eval: true
  echo: true
  message: false
  freeze: true
---


# **Geographically Weighted Predictive Models**

In this in-class exercise, we will learn how to build predictive model by using geographical random forest method. By the end of this hands-on exercise, we will acquire the skills of:

-   preparing training and test data sets by using appropriate data sampling methods,

-   calibrating predictive models by using both geospatial statistical learning and machine learning methods,

-   comparing and selecting the best model for predicting the future outcome,

-   predicting the future outcomes by using the best model calibrated.

### Installing and Loading R packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(sf, spdep, GWmodel, SpatialML, 
               tmap, rsample, Metrics, tidyverse)
```
:::


### Reading data file to rds


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mdata <- read_rds("data/model/mdata.rds")
```
:::


### Data Sampling


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)
resale_split <- initial_split(mdata, 
                              prop = 0.65/10,)
train_data <- training(resale_split)
test_data <- testing(resale_split)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(train_data, "data/model/train_data.rds")
write_rds(test_data, "data/model/test_data.rds")
```
:::


### Computing Correlation Matrix


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mdata_nogeo <- mdata %>%
  st_drop_geometry()
corrplot::corrplot(cor(mdata_nogeo[, 2:17]), 
                   diag = FALSE, 
                   order = "AOE",
                   tl.pos = "td", 
                   tl.cex = 0.5, 
                   method = "number", 
                   type = "upper")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex08_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


::: callout-important
## Observations

All the correlation values are \< 0.8, hence there is no signs of multicollinearity.
:::

## Building a non-spatial multiple linear regression


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
train_data <- read_rds("data/model/train_data.rds")
test_data <- read_rds("data/model/test_data.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
price_mlr <- lm(resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm +
                  storey_order + remaining_lease_mths +
                  PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_HAWKER +
                  PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + 
                  PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN +
                  WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS +
                  WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH,
                data=train_data)
summary(price_mlr)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

    WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS + WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH,
```

:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(price_mlr, "data/model/price_mlr.rds" ) 
```
:::


## GWR Predictive Method

In this section, we will learn how to calibrate a model to predict HDB resale price with geographically weighted regression method of GWmodel package.

### Converting the sf data frame to spatial point data frame


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
train_data_sp <- as_Spatial(train_data)
train_data_sp
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

features    : 1033 
extent      : 11646.69, 42370.04, 28330.23, 48675.05  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)

variables   : 17
names       : resale_price, floor_area_sqm, storey_order, remaining_lease_mths,         PROX_CBD,     PROX_ELDERLYCARE,        PROX_HAWKER,           PROX_MRT,          PROX_PARK,  PROX_GOOD_PRISCH,          PROX_MALL,            PROX_CHAS,     PROX_SUPERMARKET, WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN, WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE, ... 
min values  :       218000,             75,            1,                  555, 1.14923182318838, 4.28110190953706e-07, 0.0560200251289142, 0.0437298005890327, 0.0441643212802781, 0.107363170703005, 0.0864828813466827, 7.18337180115856e-09, 1.21715176356525e-07,                        0,                     0, ... 
max values  :      1110000,            126,           17,                 1148, 19.4237844042343,     3.28231449363414,   2.76474077583521,    2.0902251353839,   2.38376543636855,  10.4013344251086,   2.25269448786787,     0.79249074802552,     1.36375821567757,                        5,                    13, ... 
```


:::
:::


### Computing adaptive bandwidth


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bw_adaptive <- bw.gwr(resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm +
                  storey_order + remaining_lease_mths +
                  PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_HAWKER +
                  PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + 
                  PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN +
                  WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS +
                  WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH,
                  data=train_data_sp,
                  approach="CV",
                  kernel="gaussian",
                  adaptive=TRUE,
                  longlat=FALSE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(bw_adaptive, "data/model/bw_adaptive.rds")
```
:::


### Constructing the adaptive bandwidth gwr model


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bw_adaptive <- read_rds("data/model/bw_adaptive.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwr_adaptive <- gwr.basic(formula = resale_price ~
                            floor_area_sqm + storey_order +
                            remaining_lease_mths + PROX_CBD + 
                            PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_HAWKER +
                            PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + 
                            PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN +
                            WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS +
                            WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH,
                          data=train_data_sp,
                          bw=bw_adaptive, 
                          kernel = 'gaussian', 
                          adaptive=TRUE,
                          longlat = FALSE)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(gwr_adaptive, "data/model/gwr_adaptive.rds")
```
:::


### Retrive gwr output object


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwr_adaptive <- read_rds("data/model/gwr_adaptive.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwr_adaptive
```

### Converting the test data from sf data frame to Spatial point data frame


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
test_data_sp <- test_data %>%
  as_Spatial()
test_data_sp
```

## Preparing coordinates data

### Extracting coordinates data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
coords <- st_coordinates(mdata)
coords_train <- st_coordinates(train_data)
coords_test <- st_coordinates(test_data)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
coords_train <- write_rds(coords_train, "data/model/coords_train.rds" )
coords_test <- write_rds(coords_test, "data/model/coords_test.rds" )
```
:::


### Dropping geometry field


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
train_data <- train_data %>% 
  st_drop_geometry()
```
:::


### Calibrating Random Forest Model


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)
rf <- ranger(resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + storey_order + 
               remaining_lease_mths + PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + 
               PROX_HAWKER + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL + 
               PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN +
               WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS + 
               WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH,
             data=train_data)
rf
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}


## Calibrating Geographical Random Forest Model

### Calibrating using training data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)
gwRF_adaptive <- grf(formula = resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + storey_order +
                       remaining_lease_mths + PROX_CBD + PROX_ELDERLYCARE +
                       PROX_HAWKER + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_MALL +
                       PROX_SUPERMARKET + WITHIN_350M_KINDERGARTEN +
                       WITHIN_350M_CHILDCARE + WITHIN_350M_BUS +
                       WITHIN_1KM_PRISCH,
                     dframe=train_data, 
                     bw=55,
                     kernel="adaptive",
                     coords=coords_train)
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(gwRF_adaptive, "data/model/gwRF_adaptive.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwRF_adaptive <- read_rds("data/model/gwRF_adaptive.rds")
```
:::


### Predicting using test data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
test_data <- cbind(test_data, coords_test) %>%
  st_drop_geometry()
```
:::


ðŸ’¡ **Predicting with test data**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwRF_pred <- predict.grf(gwRF_adaptive, 
                           test_data, 
                           x.var.name="X",
                           y.var.name="Y", 
                           local.w=1,
                           global.w=0)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
GRF_pred <- write_rds(gwRF_pred, "data/model/GRF_pred.rds")
```
:::


ðŸ’¡ **Convert the output into a data frame**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
GRF_pred <- read_rds("data/model/GRF_pred.rds")
GRF_pred_df <- as.data.frame(GRF_pred)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
test_data_p <- cbind(test_data, GRF_pred_df)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(test_data_p, "data/model/test_data_p.rds")
```
:::


### Calculating Root Mean Square Error


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
rmse(test_data_p$resale_price, 
     test_data_p$GRF_pred)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 42364.51
```


:::
:::


### Visualising the predicted values


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = test_data_p,
       aes(x = GRF_pred,
           y = resale_price)) +
  geom_point()
```
